"Hello, so you're out on a quest today.": "Even setting aside all of the top ARKS, you still stand out above the rest don't you?"
"You have exceptional ability to observe and act. It shows greatly in your ethic and results."
"It seems likely that rumors would leak beyond ARKS to other organizations."
"That's why I would like to give the simple advice of taking care of yourself."
"Like the nail that sticks up gets hammered down, exceptional members are struck down."
"Personally, I'm hoping to not have to confront you since I've gotten to know you."
